channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EU designates Iran’s revolutionary guard as terrorist organisation – Europe live
item.description: The EU has just designated Iran’s revolutionary guard as terrorist organisation, the bloc’s foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas confirmed. EU enlargement...

item.title: Paedophile nursery worker admits 26 new offences including upskirting of girls
item.description: Vincent Chan, 45, is already facing years behind bars for molesting girls aged three and four at a nursery in London A paedophile nursery worker has a...

item.title: Starmer announces visa-free travel to China after talks with Xi in Beijing – UK politics live
item.description: Downing Street gives no date for when the agreement of 30 days of visa-free travel will come into force For more context on today’s Starmer - Xi meeti...

item.title: Matt Mahan, mayor of San Jose, announces run for governor of California
item.description: The former tech entrepreneur joins a sprawling but stagnant field to succeed Gavin Newsom Matt Mahan, the centrist Democrat and mayor of San Jose, ann...

item.title: Trump’s border chief vows ‘improvements’ for ICE operations but doesn’t mention fatal shootings of US citizens – live
item.description: Border czar Tom Homan in Minneapolis says ‘no agency is perfect’ and acknowledges improvements that need to be made to federal immigration enforcement...

item.title: China to relax travel rules for British visitors, UK says
item.description: It comes as Sir Keir Starmer visits Beijing - the first UK prime minister to do so in eight years.

item.title: Ministers reject Waspi calls for compensation after rethink
item.description: Women hit by changes to the state pension age say the decision shows "utter contempt" for their situation.

item.title: Great Ormond Street doctor who botched surgery harmed nearly 100 children
item.description: Yaser Jabbar specialised in limb-lengthening and reconstruction for children with complex problems.

item.title: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
item.description: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas says the move is a response to Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters.

item.title: First arrest after high-value museum raid
item.description: Detectives are still hunting for four other suspects and have released new CCTV images.
